items.title: Building and Deploying Rust with VSTS
items.content_text: Since I started at Microsoft about 6 months ago, I had to catch up on their (our) tech: Azure, .NET, Visual Studio. Yet as an avid GitHub user I overlooked one thing completely: Visual Studio Team Services! Turns out itâ€™s quite the hidden gem and after a colleague showed me some of its power, I had to look into it more deeply. Turns out itâ€™s an easy and free resource for any project. items.title: Docker Multi-Stage Build
items.content_text: On June 13, 2017 took place the Paris Container Day. They unveiled a new docker feature: multi-stage build. That's the subject of this article.
